Name.BusinessNameLine1: THE FARMINGTON HOME FOR AGED PEOPLE

AppicationSubmissionInfo.RecipientName: The Farmington Home for Aged People
AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: A written request that includes the name,address,telephone number of the person or organization making the request.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExemptPrps.RelationshipStatement: Medicaid payments and resident fees provide the necessary funds to operate the facility and perform elderly care services.
Interest and dividends and rental income provide funds to offset operating expenses for the organization.
